title: One-pot paneer curry pie
paragraph: What's more comforting than a curry in pie form? This one-pot paneer pie is filled with a makhani-style filling and topped with a crisp puff pastry lid

title: Beer mac 'n' cheese
paragraph: A staple of Manhattan's East Village, Emma Freud's cheddar and pale ale pasta dish is the ultimate comfort food

title: Italian veggie cottage pie
paragraph: An Italian twist on an English classic, with sundried tomato, spinach and aubergine, this veggie pie makes a super budget supper

title: Next level ratatouille
paragraph: Seasonal vegetables are all slow-cooked together ina dish that truly celebrates summer. Serve with bread, or for a more substantial meal,as a sidewithbarbecued or roasted meat or fish

title: Triple cheese & aubergine lasagne
paragraph: Fill sheets of pasta with tomato, aubergine and ricotta for a delicious vegetarian main - perfect for feeding a crowd

title: Melty cheese & potato pie
paragraph: Drawing from the apres-ski classic tartiflette, this indulgent pie transformsinto a cheesy fondue with creamy sliced potatoes and crisp puff pastry

title: Smoky spiced veggie rice
paragraph: Try this vegan take on a jambalaya, full of fiery and smoky flavours and bursting with vegetables. It's healthy, low in fat and calories,yet big on flavour

title: Butternut squash & sage macaroni cheese
paragraph: There's littlemore comforting than a homemade macaroni cheese. This version includes 1 of your 5-a-day, as well as a hint ofsage.

title: Spiced aubergine bake
paragraph: This is vegan comfort food at its best. Layer up slices of aubergine with a spicy coconut milk and tomato sauce for a hearty, warming meal

title: Noodles with crispy chilli oil eggs
paragraph: Make your own crispy chilli oil and use it to season noodles and pak choi. Top with fried eggs for the ultimate comfort food

title: Squash, chickpea & coconut curry
paragraph: Cook up this vibrant vegan curry that makes the most of autumnal squash. It's ideal for a meat-free Monday dinner when served with flatbreads

title: Minestrone soup
paragraph: Our easy minestrone soup makes a filling lunch or a satisfying supper, served with fresh bread. This simple bowl of goodness is packed with nutritious veg

title: Pumpkin curry with chickpeas
paragraph: A veggie dinner party dish which stands alone as a vegan main course or as a complex side dish perfect served with spiced roast meat or fish.

title: Gnocchi & tomato bake
paragraph: A comforting veggie main packed with rich Italian flavours

title: Spiced lentil & spinach pies
paragraph: Try these vegetarian pies with a spiced pastry glaze and surprise chutney middle. The lentils not only soak up all the flavours, they're filling and good for you, too

title: Coconut, rum & raisin rice pudding
paragraph: Toast rice in brown butter, cook in coconut cream and lace with rum and raisin syrup to make this rice pudding. It's a world away from school-dinner versions

title: Spinach & ricotta cannelloni
paragraph: Keep a few portions of this vegetarian classic in the freezer and you'll never be stuck for a satisfying supper

title: Frozen pumpkin cheesecake
paragraph: Swap your usual pumpkin pie for our no-bake, make-ahead cheesecake. It's perfect for Halloween or Bonfire Night, or as an autumn dessert for the dinner table

title: Leek, cheese & potato pasties
paragraph: Mini veggie pastry parcels with oozing cheese make a great value and comforting homemade snack

title: Potato curry with lime & cucumber raita
paragraph: This colourful Indian dish with a refreshing yoghurt sauce is great for vegetarians, or try serving to meat eaters with lightly spiced lamb

title: Spiced lentil & butternut squash soup
paragraph: Cooka big batch of this fillingspicedlentil andsquash soup andfreeze the leftovers for a speedy supper another day. It's healthy and low in fat

title: Wild mushroom & chestnut cottage pie
paragraph: Use penny buns or mixed wild mushrooms for this rich and earthy vegetarian recipe

title: Slow cooker ratatouille
paragraph: Make up a batch of this slow-cooked ratatouille and freeze for easy midweek meals when you're busy. Packed with nutrients, it also delivers four of your 5-a-day
